sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click="onClick()" class="btn">{{text}}</button>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'AppButton',

        props: {
            text: String, 
            color: String,
        },

        methods: {
            onClick() {
                this.$emit('toggle-add-task')
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style>
    button {
        background-color: white;
    }
</style>
